data.message: Funny how "facebook" will reply to praise, but will ignore concerns and problems when addressed.

replies.message: Hey Darren. How can I help you? -Hailey

Why am I being restricted from deleting posts from my own profile page? I got a message saying something like "you are using a tool that was not meant to be used like you are doing." I get an encrypted verification message, and replied to the "ask if you believe you are seeing this message in error." I sent a message over a week ago with no response. I can delete about 10 posts before the encrypted message reappears.

Hi Darren. Facebook has policies in place to stop behavior that other people may find annoying or abusive. We've determined that you used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: http://on.fb.me/1adtR0k. -Hailey
How is deleting posts from my own personal page, considered annoying or abusive to anyone else??? BUT FACEBOOK!
Me too! They do not help at all. Give me case numbers then send an automatic message and nothing for weeks. Keep sending in emails , reports complaintsNothing!!!
Stop sending ius to your self help section. Obviously we tried to doI it ouourselves!
^ until people that are blocked can be seen again and unable to block them again
These are my own posts Ronda.
